editorialNotes.short: Wind, waves, and tides forecast for outdoor sport enthusiasts.
Get the latest local weather forecast.
Don't let bad weather take you by surprise!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Sunny with a chance of snark
editorialNotes.standard: This is the weather app with personality.. if you’re OK with sarcasm, political jokes, and the occasional insult. But how good is it at the weather part? Drawing data from Foreca, one of meteorology’s more accurate forecasting services, it’s pretty great.
editorialNotes.short: Check the forecast from your wrist with Siri.
Be prepared for any weather forecast.
Know the temperature with a quick glance at the badge icon.

editorialNotes.short: See what the moon looks like on any given date.

editorialNotes.standard: Stay up to date when visiting the beach. Track the tide, moon rise, and more with an elegantly designed interface that we can’t help but take a peek at, even if we’re far from the shore.
